name: Bike Rider Highway Stunt Racing Attack
name_original: Bike Rider Highway Stunt Racing Attack
description:
Get ready for a challenging bike racing adventure in moto city that is full of fun, joy and passion. It is a level based moto racing game in which you will enjoy competition with your bike rivals like you are in a battle with them. Stop feel boring, say good bye to your free time and stand up for a happy moto race game. During race, you will have thrill and joy to trigger your fast race in a joyous mood.
Its first call so be ready and gear up to win this amazing bike race of racing moto. You have to go through diverse & multiple bike game tracks like island, village, desert & winter season being a professional highway rider. Use your techniques and thrill to accelerate your crazy moto bike and tilt to lean down using your expertise in this motorcycle game. We are sure that if you are a challenge lover, ultimately you will be winner and hero of the motorcycle race if you successfully chase & crush your bike rivals in attack like a death moto driver. Your riding skills in this highway traffic rider will speak itself in this adventure game of racing moto . You must control your bike speed as its high speed fast bike racing game.

In Bike Rider Highway Stunt Racing Attack we used high speed bike that’s equipped with high speed engine so you must have good controls to dodge the traffic on highway, so your action should speak louder on road to win this motorcycle racing game. Being professional moto racing driver you must perform bike wheeling, bike stunts and bike attacks on your opponent bikers to succeed in each level of this bike riding game.

----KEY FEATURES:-----
• Amazing bike physics.
• Tilt and touch controls.
• Challenging game play.
• Realistic environments.
• Clear and HD graphics.
